name: Inis the Energy of the Sea Roll On Perfume for Women and Men - Clean, Fresh, Ocean Eau de Parfum - 0.27 Fl Oz
short_description: REVITALIZING UNISEX FRAGRANCE: Feel the energy of the sea with each roll on. A fresh, sparkling cologne that evokes memories of sunny coastal days with ocean breezes, making you feel connected to the sea wherever you are.
EAU DE PARFUM: A more concentrated version of our regular cologne, so a little goes a long way.

ENERGIZING SCENT PROFILE: Refreshing, bright top notes of Sicilian lemon, bergamot, neroli, and marine. Middle notes of lily of the valley and geranium add a floral touch, while base notes of sandalwood and clove provide a warm, grounding finish.
SEA-INSPIRED DESIGN: Our popular frosted bottle resembles smooth glass pebbles - reminiscent of beach finds on sun soaked days.
INIS is the signature scent of Fragrances of Ireland - a boutique perfumery and family business. For over 40 years we have been creating products inspired by the beauty and nature of Ireland.

name: Pheromones Perfumes for Women,Long Lasting Roll on Perfume Oil 0.34 fl.oz (10ml)
short_description: Pheromone Formulation:Our women's pheromone perfume is made from pure natural ingredients and infused with a powerful pheromone oil formulation to highlight your unique charm, helping you stand out and unleash your allure and confidence

Unique Fragrance:This pheromone perfume is blend of floral and fruity notes creates a sweet and alluring fragrance that turns heads wherever you go. More than just a memorable scent, it amplify your natural appeal while being gentle on your skin

Long Lasting Fragrance:Expertly crafted for an enduring fragrance, our long lasting perfume ensures you stay captivating throughout all the day. Its long-lasting scent makes a lasting impression, boosting your natural magnetism and allowing you to enjoy the scent's full potential

Roll-On Application:The convenient rollerball design allows for precise application on pulse points like the wrists, neck, and behind the ears. The roll on perfume oil for women with lightweight formula,leaving behind a delicate, luxurious aroma that's easy to reapply.No spills, no waste—just effortless elegance.

Portable & Convenient:Compact and leak-proof design, this portable perfume fits perfectly in your purse, clutch, or pocket. Stay confident and alluring anytime, anywhere—whether at work, parties, date,romantic evenings ,travel or any special occasion where you want to shine.
